entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, referred to as 'little baby Potter' by Bellatrix. He is able to cast the Unforgivable Curse 'Crucio' and is described as having a strong hatred for Bellatrix.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: A character who is able to counter Harry's spell and is described as being breathless and no longer laughing. She is referred to as 'the handsome wizard' by Harry.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: A character who is mentioned as having been affected by the Unforgivable Curse 'Crucio', causing him to writhe and shriek with pain.

relationships.description: Harry and Bellatrix are enemies, as evidenced by the strong hatred Harry feels towards her and the fact that they are engaging in a magical duel.
Harry and Neville have had similar experiences with the Unforgivable Curse 'Crucio', as evidenced by Neville's reaction to it in the past.
